explanation: [0-0] In the frame, four construction workers are together, carrying a concrete wall block, and in front of them is a concrete wall under construction. A man with short hair in khaki pants and a man with short hair in a blue-collar shirt stand side by side in front, using a metal rod to lift the concrete wall, while a man in a blue-sleeved shirt and a man in black pants stand side by side behind the concrete wall, all wearing gloves. Some bricks and other building materials are piled on the ground, with green vegetation on the far left of the picture and a light-colored wall on the far right.
[0-2] Then the camera zooms in as the four of them put the concrete wall block they are carrying onto the concrete wall under construction.
